item.title: 算法::二叉树的最近公共祖先
item.description:
链接

236. 二叉树的最近公共祖先 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

# Definition for a binary tree node.
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None

class Solution:
    def lowestCommonAncestor(self, root: 'TreeNode', p: 'TreeNode', q: 'TreeNode') -> 'TreeNode':
        if root is None or p == root or q == root:
            return root
        left = self.lowestCommonAncestor(root.left, p, q)
        right = self.lowestCommonAncestor(root.right, p, q)
        if left and right:
            return root
        return left if left else right

    def majorityElement(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        return sorted(nums)[len(nums)//2]

item.title: 算法::合并两个有序链表
item.description:
链接

21. 合并两个有序链表 - 力扣（LeetCode）

题解

class Solution:
    def mergeTwoLists(self, l1: ListNode, l2: ListNode) -> ListNode:
        if l1 is None:
            return l2
        if l2 is None:
            return l1
        if l1.val < l2.val:
            l1.next = self.mergeTwoLists(l1.next, l2)
            return l1
        else:
            l2.next = self.mergeTwoLists(l1, l2.next)
            return l2

item.title: 算法::二叉树的层序遍历
item.description:
链接

102.二叉树的层序遍历 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class Solution:
    def levelOrder(self, root: TreeNode) -> List[List[int]]:
        if not root:
            return []
        q = [root]
        ans = []
        while q:
            length = len(q)
            level = []
            for _ in range(length):
                node = q.pop(0)
                level.append(node.val)
                if node.left:
                    q.append(node.left)
                if node.right:
                    q.append(node.right)
            ans.append(level)
        return ans

item.title: 算法::删除链表的倒数第 N 个结点
item.description:
链接

19. 删除链表的倒数第 N 个结点 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

func removeNthFromEnd(head *ListNode, n int) *ListNode {
   num, temp := 0, head
   for temp != nil {
      num++
      temp = temp.Next
   }
   if num-n == 0 {
      return head.Next
   }
   count := num - n - 1
   temp = head
   for count != 0 {
      temp = temp.Next
      count--
   }
   temp.Next = temp.Next.Next
   return head
}

item.title: 算法::用栈实现队列
item.description:
链接

232. 用栈实现队列 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class MyQueue {

    /**
     * Initialize your data structure here.
     */
    private final Stack<Integer> in;

    private final Stack<Integer> out;

    public MyQueue() {
        in = new Stack<>();
        out = new Stack<>();
    }

    /**
     * Push element x to the back of queue.
     */
    public void push(int x) {
        in.push(x);
    }

    /**
     * Removes the element from in front of queue and returns that element.
     */
    public int pop() {
        if (out.isEmpty()) {
            while (!in.isEmpty()) {
                out.push(in.pop());
            }
        }
        return out.pop();
    }

    /**
     * Get the front element.
     */
    public int peek() {
        if (out.isEmpty()) {
            while (!in.isEmpty()) {
                out.push(in.pop());
            }
        }
        return out.peek();
    }

    /**
     * Returns whether the queue is empty.
     */
    public boolean empty() {
        return in.isEmpty() && out.isEmpty();
    }
}

item.title: 算法::反转链表
item.description:
链接

206. 反转链表 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class Solution:
    def reverseList(self, head: ListNode) -> ListNode:
        if not head or not head.next:
            return head
        tail = self.reverseList(head.next)
        head.next.next = head
        head.next = None
        return tail

item.title: 算法::LRU缓存机制
item.description:
链接

146. LRU 缓存机制 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class LinkedNode:
    def __init__(self, key, val):
        self.key = key
        self.val = val
        self.prev = None
        self.next = None


class LRUCache:

    def __init__(self, capacity: int):
        self.cache = dict()
        self.head = LinkedNode(0, 0)
        self.tail = LinkedNode(0, 0)
        self.head.next = self.tail
        self.tail.prev = self.head
        self.capacity = capacity
        self.size = 0

    def get(self, key: int) -> int:
        if not key in self.cache.keys():
            return -1
        node = self.cache.get(key)
        self.move_to_head(node)
        return node.val

    def put(self, key: int, value: int) -> None:
        if key in self.cache.keys():
            node = self.cache.get(key)
            node.val = value
            self.cache[key] = node
            self.move_to_head(node)
        else:
            node = LinkedNode(key, value)
            self.add_head(node)
            self.size += 1
            self.cache[key] = node
            if self.size > self.capacity:
                tail = self.remove_tail()
                self.cache.pop(tail.key)
                self.size -= 1

    def move_to_head(self, node: LinkedNode):
        self.remove(node)
        self.add_head(node)

    def remove(self, node: LinkedNode):
        node.prev.next = node.next
        node.next.prev = node.prev

    def add_head(self, node: LinkedNode):
        node.prev = self.head
        node.next = self.head.next
        self.head.next.prev = node
        self.head.next = node

    def remove_tail(self) -> LinkedNode:
        node = self.tail.prev
        self.remove(node)
        return node

item.title: 算法::环形链表
item.description:
链接

141. 环形链表 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class Solution:
    def hasCycle(self, head: ListNode) -> bool:
        if head is None:
            return False
        slow, fast = head, head
        while fast and fast.next:
            slow = slow.next
            fast = fast.next.next
            if slow == fast:
                return True
        return False

item.title: 算法::排序数组
item.description:
链接

912. 排序数组 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一：快速排序递归

class Solution:
    def sortArray(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[int]:
        if nums is None or len(nums) == 0:
            return []
        return self.sortArray(list(filter(lambda x: x <= nums[0], nums[1:]))) + [nums[0]] + self.sortArray(list(filter(lambda x: x > nums[0], nums[1:])))

item.title: 算法::路径总和
item.description:
链接

112.路径总和 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

# Definition for a binary tree node.
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, val=0, left=None, right=None):
#         self.val = val
#         self.left = left
#         self.right = right
class Solution:
    def hasPathSum(self, root: Optional[TreeNode], targetSum: int) -> bool:
        if root is None:
            return False
        if root.left is None and root.right is None:
            return root.val == targetSum
        return self.hasPathSum(root.left, targetSum - root.val) or self.hasPathSum(root.right, targetSum - root.val)
:

item.title: 多线程::哲学家就餐
item.description:
解法一：Semaphore

class DiningPhilosophers {

    Semaphore semaphore = new Semaphore(1);

    public DiningPhilosophers() {

    }

    // call the run() method of any runnable to execute its code
    public void wantsToEat(int philosopher, Runnable pickLeftFork, Runnable pickRightFork, Runnable eat, Runnable putLeftFork, Runnable putRightFork) throws InterruptedException {
        semaphore.acquire();
        pickLeftFork.run();
        pickRightFork.run();
        eat.run();
        putLeftFork.run();
        putRightFork.run();
        semaphore.release();

    }
}

item.title: 多线程::H2O 生成
item.description:
链接

1117. H2O 生成 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一：Semaphore

class H2O {

    Semaphore hydrogen = new Semaphore(2);

    Semaphore oxygen = new Semaphore(0);

    public H2O() {

    }

    public void hydrogen(Runnable releaseHydrogen) throws InterruptedException {

        // releaseHydrogen.run() outputs "H". Do not change or remove this line.

        hydrogen.acquire();
        releaseHydrogen.run();
        oxygen.release();
    }

    public void oxygen(Runnable releaseOxygen) throws InterruptedException {

        // releaseOxygen.run() outputs "O". Do not change or remove this line.
        oxygen.acquire(2);
        releaseOxygen.run();
        hydrogen.release(2);
    }
}

item.title: 多线程::交替打印字符串
item.description:
链接

1195. 交替打印字符串 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一：Spin Lock

class FizzBuzz {
    private int n;

    volatile int count = 1;

    public FizzBuzz(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printFizz.run() outputs "fizz".
    public void fizz(Runnable printFizz) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            while (count % 3 != 0 || count % 5 == 0) {
                if (count > n) {
                    return;
                }
                Thread.yield();
            }
            if (i % 3 != 0 || i % 5 == 0) {
                continue;
            }
            printFizz.run();
            count++;
        }
    }

    // printBuzz.run() outputs "buzz".
    public void buzz(Runnable printBuzz) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            while (count % 5 != 0 || count % 3 == 0) {
                if (count > n) {
                    return;
                }
                Thread.yield();
            }
            if (i % 5 != 0 || i % 3 == 0) {
                continue;
            }
            printBuzz.run();
            count++;
        }
    }

    // printFizzBuzz.run() outputs "fizzbuzz".
    public void fizzbuzz(Runnable printFizzBuzz) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            while (count % 15 != 0) {
                if (count > n) {
                    return;
                }
                Thread.yield();
            }
            if (i % 15 != 0) {
                continue;
            }
            printFizzBuzz.run();
            count++;
        }
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void number(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            while (count % 3 == 0 || count % 5 == 0) {
                if (count > n) {
                    return;
                }
                Thread.yield();
            }
            if (i % 3 == 0 || i % 5 == 0) {
                continue;
            }
            printNumber.accept(i);
            count++;
        }
    }
}

item.title: 多线程::打印零与奇偶数
item.description:
链接

1116. 打印零与奇偶数 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一：Spin Lock

class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;

    volatile int count = 0;

    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            while (count % 4 == 1 || count % 4 == 3) {
                Thread.yield();
            }
            printNumber.accept(0);
            count++;
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            while (count % 4 != 1) {
                Thread.yield();
            }
            printNumber.accept(i);
            count++;
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            while (count % 4 != 3) {
                Thread.yield();
            }
            printNumber.accept(i);
            count++;
        }
    }
}

解法二：Semaphore

class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;

    Semaphore zero = new Semaphore(1);

    Semaphore even = new Semaphore(0);

    Semaphore odd = new Semaphore(0);

    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            zero.acquire();
            printNumber.accept(0);
            if (i % 2 == 0) {
                odd.release();
            }
            else {
                even.release();
            }
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            even.acquire();
            printNumber.accept(i);
            zero.release();
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            odd.acquire();
            printNumber.accept(i);
            zero.release();
        }
    }
}

解法三：CyclicBarrier

class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;

    CyclicBarrier zero = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    CyclicBarrier even = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    CyclicBarrier odd = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            try {
                printNumber.accept(0);
                if (i % 2 == 0) {
                    odd.await();
                }
                else {
                    even.await();
                }
                zero.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            try {
                even.await();
                printNumber.accept(i);
                zero.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            try {
                odd.await();
                printNumber.accept(i);
                zero.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

解法四：LockSupport

class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;

    Thread zero = null;

    Thread odd = null;

    Thread even = null;

    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        zero = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            printNumber.accept(0);
            // 不判空在leetcode上会出现超时，一直要到odd和even初始化完再往下走
            while (odd == null || even == null) {
                Thread.yield();
            }
            if (i % 2 == 0) {
                LockSupport.unpark(odd);
            }
            else {
                LockSupport.unpark(even);
            }
            LockSupport.park();
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        even = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            LockSupport.park();
            printNumber.accept(i);
            LockSupport.unpark(zero);
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        odd = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            LockSupport.park();
            printNumber.accept(i);
            LockSupport.unpark(zero);
        }
    }
}

解法五：Synchroinzed + wait/notifyAll

class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;

    volatile int count = 0;

    final Object lock = new Object();

    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            synchronized (lock) {
                while (count != 0) {
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printNumber.accept(0);
                count = i % 2 + 1;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            synchronized (lock) {
                while (count != 2) {
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printNumber.accept(i);
                count = 0;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            synchronized (lock) {
                while (count != 1) {
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printNumber.accept(i);
                count = 0;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }
}

解法六：Lock + Condition

class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;

    ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();

    Condition zero = lock.newCondition();

    Condition odd = lock.newCondition();

    Condition even = lock.newCondition();

    volatile int count = 0;

    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            lock.lock();
            while (count != 0) {
                zero.await();
            }
            printNumber.accept(0);
            if (i % 2 == 0) {
                count = 1;
                odd.signal();
            }
            else {
                count = 2;
                even.signal();
            }
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            lock.lock();
            if (count != 2) {
                even.await();
            }
            printNumber.accept(i);
            count = 0;
            zero.signal();
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            lock.lock();
            if (count != 1) {
                odd.await();
            }
            printNumber.accept(i);
            count = 0;
            zero.signal();
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }
}

item.title: 多线程::交替打印FooBar
item.description:
链接

1115. 交替打印 FooBar - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一： Semaphore

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    Semaphore foo = new Semaphore(1);

    Semaphore bar = new Semaphore(0);

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            foo.acquire();
            printFoo.run();
            bar.release();
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            bar.acquire();;
            printBar.run();
            foo.release();
        }
    }
}

解法二：Spin Lock

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    private volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            // 如果while的循环体里面不加yield会导致超时，它可能不会自己让出cpu
            while (flag) {Thread.yield();}
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            while (!flag) {Thread.yield();}
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
        }
    }
}

解法三：Lock + Conditon

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();

    Condition foo = lock.newCondition();

    Condition bar = lock.newCondition();

    volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            lock.lock();
            if (flag) {
                foo.await();
            }
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
            bar.signal();
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            lock.lock();
            if (!flag) {
                bar.await();
            }
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
            foo.signal();
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }
}

解法四：LockSupport

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    private boolean flag = true;

    Thread foo = null;

    Thread bar = null;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        foo = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (!flag) {
                LockSupport.park();
            }
            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
            LockSupport.unpark(bar);
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        bar = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            if (flag) {
                LockSupport.park();
            }
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
            LockSupport.unpark(foo);
            ;
        }
    }
}

解法五：Synchronized + wait/notifyAll

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    Object lock = new Object();

    volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            synchronized (lock) {
                if (flag) {
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printFoo.run();
                flag = !flag;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            synchronized (lock) {
                if (!flag){
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printBar.run();
                flag=!flag;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }
}

解法六：CyclicBarrier

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    CyclicBarrier barrier = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            while (flag) {
                Thread.yield();
            }
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
            try {
                barrier.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            try {
                barrier.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
        }
    }
}

item.title: 算法::第一个错误的版本
item.description:
链接

278. 第一个错误的版本 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class Solution:
    def firstBadVersion(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        left, mid, right = 1, -1, n
        while left < right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if isBadVersion(mid):
                right = mid
            else:
                left = mid + 1
        return left

item.title: 算法::二分查找
item.description:
链接

704. 二分查找 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

from typing import List

class Solution:
    def search(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
        left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while left <= right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return mid
            elif nums[mid] > target:
                right = mid - 1
            else:
                left = mid + 1
        return -1

item.title: 算法::搜索插入位置
item.description:
链接

35. 搜索插入位置 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

from typing import List

class Solution:
    def searchInsert(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
        left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while left <= right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return mid
            if nums[mid] < target:
                left = mid + 1
            else:
                right = mid - 1
        return left

item.title: 多线程::按需打印
item.description:
链接

1114. 按序打印 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一：synchronized + wait/notifyAll

class Foo {

    final Object lock = new Object();

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        synchronized (lock) {
            while (count != 1) {
                lock.wait();
            }
            printFirst.run();
            count = 2;
            lock.notifyAll();
        }
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        synchronized (lock) {
            while (count != 2) {
                lock.wait();
            }
            printSecond.run();
            count = 3;
            lock.notifyAll();
        }
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        synchronized (lock) {
            while (count != 3) {
                lock.wait();
            }
            printThird.run();
            count = 1;
            lock.notifyAll();
        }
    }
}

解法二：Semaphore

class Foo {

    Semaphore second = new Semaphore(0);

    Semaphore third = new Semaphore(0);

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        //
        printFirst.run();
        second.release();
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        second.acquire();
        printSecond.run();
        third.release();
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        third.acquire();
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法三：Spin Lock

class Foo {

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        //
        while (count != 1);
        printFirst.run();
        count = 2;
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count != 2);
        printSecond.run();
        count = 3;
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count != 3);
        printThird.run();
        count = 1;
    }
}

解法四：CountDownLatch

class Foo {

    CountDownLatch second = new CountDownLatch(1);

    CountDownLatch third = new CountDownLatch(1);

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        //
        printFirst.run();
        second.countDown();
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        second.await();
        printSecond.run();
        third.countDown();
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        third.await();
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法五：Lock + Conditon

class Foo {

    ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();

    Condition first = lock.newCondition();

    Condition second = lock.newCondition();

    Condition third = lock.newCondition();

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        lock.lock();
        if (count != 1) {
            first.await();
        }
        count = 2;
        printFirst.run();
        second.signal();
        lock.unlock();
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        lock.lock();
        if (count != 2) {
            second.await();
        }
        count = 3;
        printSecond.run();
        third.signal();
        lock.unlock();
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        lock.lock();
        if (count != 3) {
            third.await();
        }
        count = 1;
        printThird.run();
        first.signal();
        lock.unlock();
    }
}

解法六：CyclicBarrier

class Foo {

    CyclicBarrier first = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    CyclicBarrier second = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        try {
            printFirst.run();
            first.await();
        } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        try {
            first.await();
            printSecond.run();
            second.await();
        } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        try {
            second.await();
            printThird.run();
        } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

解法七：LockSupport

class Foo {

    Thread first = null;

    Thread second = null;

    Thread third = null;

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        first = Thread.currentThread();
        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        printFirst.run();
        count = 2;
        LockSupport.unpark(second);
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        second = Thread.currentThread();
        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        if (count != 2) {
            LockSupport.park();
        }
        printSecond.run();
        count = 3;
        LockSupport.unpark(third);
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        third = Thread.currentThread();
        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        if (count != 3) {
            LockSupport.park();
        }
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法八：Atomic

class Foo {

    AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger(1);

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.get() != 1);
        printFirst.run();
        count.getAndIncrement();

    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.get() != 2);
        printSecond.run();
        count.getAndIncrement();

    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.get() != 3);
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法九：LongAddr

class Foo {

    LongAdder count = new LongAdder();

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.longValue() != 0);
        printFirst.run();
        count.increment();

    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.longValue() != 1);
        printSecond.run();
        count.increment();

    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.longValue() != 2);
        printThird.run();
    }
}
